ELECTRICAL SERVICES INAltadena Fire Recovery & Electrical Rebuilding After the Eaton Fire

Expert electrical contractors serving Altadena Fire Recovery & Electrical Rebuilding After the Eaton Fire, CA

Residential Services
Electrical solutions for Altadena Fire Recovery & Electrical Rebuilding After the Eaton Fire homes and residential properties.

Commercial Services
Professional electrical work for Altadena Fire Recovery & Electrical Rebuilding After the Eaton Fire businesses and commercial properties.

About Altadena Fire Recovery & Electrical Rebuilding After the Eaton Fire

Altadena, a resilient foothill community situated at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains just north of Pasadena, is known for its natural beauty, historic Christmas Tree Lane, Eaton Canyon trails, and close-knit neighborhoods. Following the catastrophic Eaton Fire in January 2025, which tragically destroyed over 9,000 buildings and deeply impacted the Altadena community, Shaffer Construction is here to support residents through every phase of recovery and rebuilding. As Altadena rebuilds stronger and safer, we’re committed to providing compassionate, expert electrical services to help restore homes, ensure electrical safety, and bring power back to this cherished community.

Shaffer Construction is your dedicated Altadena electrician for Eaton Fire recovery, electrical restoration, and home rebuilding services. We specialize in complete electrical rewiring for fire-damaged properties, ensuring all installations meet current electrical codes and enhanced fire safety standards. Our licensed electricians provide essential electrical panel upgrades with modern safety features, backup generator installations for emergency power during future outages and public safety power shutoffs, and fire-resistant electrical system designs for wildfire-prone foothill areas. Whether you’re rebuilding your Craftsman bungalow after the Eaton Fire, upgrading electrical systems for enhanced safety and resilience, or need electrical safety inspections, security lighting, landscape lighting, EV charger installation, or whole-building surge protection, Shaffer Construction stands with Altadena through recovery. For trusted electrical service during your rebuilding journey, choose Shaffer Construction – your partner in restoring power and peace of mind to the Altadena community.

Call (323) 642-8509 Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm

ELECTRICAL SERVICES INPacific Palisades

Expert electrical solutions for homes and businesses recovering from the January 2025 Palisades Fire

Pacific Palisades is a coastal community in Los Angeles nestled between the Santa Monica Mountains and the Pacific Ocean. Following the catastrophic January 2025 Palisades Fire that destroyed thousands of structures, many residents are rebuilding with modern, fire-resistant electrical systems.

Shaffer Construction specializes in fire recovery electrical work—from complete rewiring and panel upgrades to EV charger installation and smart home systems. We understand local permitting with LA Building and Safety (LADBS West LA District), LADWP coordination, insurance documentation, and FEMA assistance programs.

Our team brings compassionate service, technical excellence, and local expertise to help Pacific Palisades families and businesses rebuild stronger, safer, and future-ready.

Call (323) 642-8509

Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm | Fire Recovery Specialists

About Torrance

Torrance, a key city in the South Bay, is known for its safe neighborhoods, excellent schools, thriving business sector including major automotive companies, and beautiful coastline featuring Torrance Beach. Shaffer Construction is proud to serve this balanced and prosperous community. Fun fact: Torrance was one of the first planned communities in California, designed in 1912 by landscape architect Frederick Law Olmsted Jr., known for his work on national parks! This planning contributes to its pleasant layout but also means a range of electrical system ages.

Shaffer Construction offers comprehensive electrical services for Torrance residents and businesses. Our licensed Torrance electricians handle everything from essential safety checks like electrical safety inspections to major upgrades like electrical panel upgrades. Enhance your home’s value and convenience with EV charger installation or beautify your yard with landscape lighting. We provide reliable breaker panel service, efficient energy efficiency solutions, and prompt electrical repairs. For trusted, expert electrical work in Torrance, rely on Shaffer Construction.

About Culver City

Culver City, historically known as the “Heart of Screenland,” continues to be a hub for film and television production while blossoming into a vibrant center for tech, arts, and dining. Shaffer Construction is excited to serve this innovative and growing community. Did you know the famous yellow brick road from “The Wizard of Oz” was part of the original MGM studios located right here in Culver City? From historic studio lots to modern office buildings and charming residential streets, Culver City presents unique electrical challenges and opportunities.

Shaffer Construction is your trusted Culver City electrician, equipped to handle the diverse needs of this dynamic area. We specialize in commercial EV charger installations for businesses and apartments, as well as seamless residential EV charger setups. Ensure your property is safe and efficient with electrical safety inspections and energy efficiency upgrades. Our licensed electricians also expertly manage data network & AV wiring for homes and offices, and provide essential breaker panel service and maintenance. Choose Shaffer Construction for top-quality electrical work in Culver City.

Santa Clarita, known for its family-friendly atmosphere, beautiful parks and trails, and thriving business community, offers a high quality of life just north of Los Angeles. Shaffer Construction is proud to provide expert electrical services to this expansive valley city. Fun fact: Santa Clarita is often called “Hollywood North” due to the large number of film ranches located nearby, where countless movies and TV shows have been filmed! From sprawling ranch homes to newer developments and commercial centers, Santa Clarita’s electrical infrastructure supports a growing population.

Shaffer Construction is your reliable Santa Clarita electrician. We cater to the needs of homeowners and businesses, offering a wide range of services. Ensure your family’s comfort and safety with ceiling fan installations and electrical safety inspections. Power your lifestyle with pool and spa electrical wiring and convenient EV charger installations. We also handle essential upgrades like electrical panel upgrades and provide dependable backup generator solutions. About Atwater Village

Nestled between the Los Angeles River and Griffith Park, Atwater Village boasts a unique blend of small-town charm and urban convenience. Known for its walkable streets, independent boutiques along Glendale Boulevard, and the iconic Atwater Village Theatre, it’s a community we at Shaffer Construction love working in. Did you know Atwater Village was originally known for its celery fields before its development in the early 20th century? This rich history is reflected in its diverse architecture, from charming bungalows to modern homes, each with specific electrical needs.

Shaffer Construction is proud to be the trusted electrician for Atwater Village residents and businesses. We understand the local nuances, whether it’s updating wiring in a classic California bungalow or installing energy-efficient solutions for a new build. Our licensed Atwater Village electricians provide a full range of services, including electrical panel upgrades to handle modern power demands, safe EV charger installations, and stylish lighting installation and retrofitting. Need reliable electrical troubleshooting and repairs or interested in smart home automation? Shaffer Construction brings expertise and neighborly service right to your Atwater Village doorstep.

About Echo Park

Echo Park, with its iconic lake, lotus flowers, and stunning views of the downtown skyline, is one of LA’s most historic and hip neighborhoods. Shaffer Construction loves the energy and architectural diversity of this community. Fun fact: Echo Park Lake was originally built as a drinking water reservoir in the 1860s! Today, the neighborhood features everything from Victorian homes perched on hillsides to trendy apartments and businesses along Sunset Boulevard, each requiring knowledgeable electrical care.

Shaffer Construction provides expert electrician services throughout Echo Park. We understand the unique needs of older homes, offering crucial complete electrical rewiring and panel upgrades to ensure safety and meet modern demands.
